(#{t.id},#{t.number1}, #{t.number2}, #{t.number3}, #{t.number4}, #{t.number5}, #{t.number6}, #{t.number7})

insert into big_fun_all (id, number1, number2, number3, number4, number5,number6,number7) values
(#{t.id},#{t.number1}, #{t.number2}, #{t.number3}, #{t.number4}, #{t.number5}, #{t.number6}, #{t.number7})
mapper.select:
select
from double_color_all where number1 = #{number1,jdbcType=INTEGER} and number2 = #{number2,jdbcType=INTEGER} and number3 = #{number3,jdbcType=INTEGER} and number4 = #{number4,jdbcType=INTEGER} and number5 = #{number5,jdbcType=INTEGER} and number6 = #{number6,jdbcType=INTEGER} and number7 = #{number7,jdbcType=INTEGER}
